thread.title: AVID Technical Resources Announces New VP of Sales
thread.title_full: AVID Technical Resources Announces New VP of Sales - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: AVID Technical Resources Announces New VP of Sales
text:
Chip Kakas is Promoted from Regional Director to VP
 BOSTON, MA, October 20, AVID Technical Resources announced today that Chip Kakas has been promoted to VP of sales.
Kakas previously held the title of Regional Director of Operations with AVID. He has been with AVID since 2011, helping the company open several new offices, including mostly recently, San Francisco, CA and Des Moines, Iowa.
"We're proud to have Chip on our team," says Principal Owner Brian Tomasello. "He has played a major part in our growth over the past few years and now he'll ultimately be driving our national expansion."
AVID Technical Resources has become one of the leading IT recruiting firms in the country. Headquartered in Boston, MA, the company has posted year over year growth since their inception in 2003.
The continued growth has triggered numerous awards and national recognition. Inc. Magazine has listed AVID on their exclusive 500/5000 list of Fastest Growing Private Companies in the US for three out of the past four years. Staffing Industry Analysts ranked AVID one of the Fastest Growing staffing firms in the nation and Forbes Magazine named AVID one of the leading staffing agencies in the Northeast.
AVID has nine offices across the US and continues to expand aggressively. The company is currently targeting new offices in Dallas, Chicago and Raleigh, NC.
For more information, visit www.avidtr.com .
